meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of exorcism.
meanings.sent1: The exorcistic ritual was performed by the priest.
meanings.sent2: The exorcistic symbols were used to ward off evil spirits.
meanings.sent3: The exorcistic ceremony had everyone in awe.
meanings.sent4: Her exorcistic powers seemed to banish all negativity.
meanings.sent5: The exorcistic chants echoed through the room, cleansing it of darkness.

meanings.definition: Involving the expulsion of evil spirits.
meanings.sent1: The exorcistic process was intense but necessary.
meanings.sent2: The exorcistic ritual successfully removed the malevolent entity.
meanings.sent3: The exorcistic endeavor left the room feeling lighter.
meanings.sent4: His exorcistic abilities were unmatched in the village.
meanings.sent5: The exorcistic energy filled the space, pushing out all negativity.

meanings.definition: Of or pertaining to the practice of exorcism.
meanings.sent1: The exorcistic tools were carefully prepared for the ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The exorcistic knowledge passed down through generations.
meanings.sent3: The exorcistic tradition was deeply rooted in their culture.
meanings.sent4: Her exorcistic expertise was sought after by many.
meanings.sent5: The exorcistic rituals were performed with precision and dedication.
